name: Shadow Amulet
description: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.

abilities.name: Fade
abilities.description: Turns the target invisible after a fade time. The invisibility is broken upon casting an ability or item, or upon attacking.
notes: Does not interrupt the wielder's channeling abilities
The caster does not require to face the target in order to cast it on them
Can only be cast on heroes, including illusions and creep-heroes
Recasting the ability refreshes the buff duration
Does not grant the target phased movement
Effective duration of the invisibility is 2.25 seconds, due to the fade time
Picking up, dropping, or selling items does not break the invisibility
During the fade time, casting abilities or items does not break the invisibility
After the fade time, upon reaching the cast point of abilities or items breaks invisibility
After the fade, upon reaching the attack point of an attack breaks invisibility, regardless of whether the attack lands or not
For ranged units this is upon projectile launch
Does not share cooldowns with Glimmer Cape

additionalInfo: Available in the Base Shop under Miscellaneous category
Used as a component for Glimmer Cape and Shadow Blade
Provides invisibility with movement speed reduction during fade time
Buff is dispellable by any dispel sources
